title: siddhEshvarAya namastE
sahitya:
siddhIshvarAya namastE jagat prasiddhEshvarAya namastE


anupallavi

 buddhEshvarAya parAya varAya bhukti mukti prada catura tarakarAya shuddha 
satva guNA karAya vishuddha cakra nilayAya nitya sukhatara karAya shankarAya


caraNam   nirmala hrdaya vihArAya harAya nIlAmbar-AkArAya shrIkarAya carmAmbara dharAya 
candrashEkharAya shabdAdi panca tanmAtrA dhArAya dharmAdy-akhila puruSArttha 
pradAyaka guruguha kumArAya karma jnAna yOga sAkSAtkArAya vidaLita mArAya
